TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content: I\'ve sent in another ticket, so another 24 hours. This time I\'ll remember to turn off emails (although someone please remind me).
TURN OFF EMAILS! There is your reminder.

> 
> What site is it!? I blame the web host. Lets just move to my forum. If Radion acquired the info. And not getting that Dwarf

Your forum as a permanent one would be absolute and utter chaos. No test, about 50 moderators, etc.

> 
> If you pass the test.

Well Radion just pm\'d me: '72'
So, that\'s good?
I think so? I got 74, and he didn\'t say anything about me just scraping in or anything like that.

Right, it\'s back up. When you get on, would everyone please go into their profile, go to modify profile; personal messaging, and turn off the email notifications, because they might well be the root cause of this.

I\'m leaving the RP for good this time. Please remove my corporation.

I\'ll leave you all alone to slowly go crazy by yourselves.

> 
> Alright, forum down for anyone?

No.
